title: 1XBot - Home
timeout-words: Timeout user for 1 minute if any of these words are used (use commas to seperate the words)
ban-words: Ban user if any of these words are used: (use commas to seperate the words)
allow-links: Allow users to share any link in the chat
editors: Bot editors (use commas to seperate the users)
command-helper:
You can use these variables in your commands:

%username%: Username of the person who used the command
%usernameorparam%: Username of the person who used the command, or the parameter after the command
%timesused%: Amount of times the command has been used
%followdate%: Follow date of the user
%followtime%: Follow time of the user
%addquote%: Adding quotes (Command's content should be %addquote%, no additions)
%getquote%: Getting quotes. To search in quotes, you can put part of the quote as a parameter
%randomviewer%: A random viewer's username
%uptime%: Uptime of the stream
%game%: Game that is being played on the stream
%title%: Title of the stream
%commands%: Lists commands


You can use these variables in your subscription messages:

%username%: Subscriber's username
%months%: Amount of months the user has subscribed(only in resubscriptions)
%gifter%: Username of the one who gifted the sub(only when someone gifts a subscription)
need-to-login: You need to login to access this page.
